classes.name: Window
classes.description: The ui.Window class provides an interface to the window objects create with the OPEN WINDOW instruction.

classMethods.name: forName
classMethods.description: Get a window object by name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Defines the name of the window.

classes.name: Dialog
classes.description: The ui.Dialog class provides a set of methods to configure, query and control the current interactive instruction.

classMethods.name: createConstructByName
classMethods.description: Creates an ui.Dialog object to implement a dynamic CONSTRUCT BY NAME.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The list of form fields controlled by the dialog.
